rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0727, 3562, 3892, 4506, 4514}

description: This introductory unit will introduce the student to the ANMC competency domain of collaborative and therapeutic practice. Content in this unit will compliment theory and skills taught in other units in semester one of the course. Students will be provided the opportunity to explore important professional aspects of being a nurse or midwife and the significance of fitness for practice. Students will: describe the basic psychological process of human behaviour; demonstrate effective communication  with individuals and groups  and other members of the healthcare team; discuss how evidence is translated into clinical practice.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
